name: Zygarde
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: This is Zygarde’s form when about 10% of its cells have been gathered. It runs across the land at speeds greater than 60 mph.

abilities.name: Earthen Aura
abilities.effect: Damage from this Pokémon’s attacks isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Peace Maker
attacks.effect: If your opponent has an Ultra Beast in play, this attack does 30 more damage.
